roleset.name: assign a label or attribute

example.name: all args
example.text: Time Warner emphasized in a news release that it should be evaluated based on its cash flow, which-1 the company defined *trace*-1 as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization.
example.arg: as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization

roleset.note: Comparison with 'regard'. Member of VNcls characterize-29.2-1-1, reflexive_appearance-48.1.2.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'define' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
